create SCHEMA gold;

------------------------
-- CREATE VIEW CALENDAR
------------------------
CREATE VIEW gold.calendar
AS
SELECT 
    * 
FROM 
    OPENROWSET
        (
            BULK 'https://rmpyru.dfs.core.windows.net/adventureworks/silver/AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        ) as QUER1;

--CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.Ext_Sales
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'ext_sales',
    DATA_SOURCE = aw_gold,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
